page.title: 04Uniform and Equipment
page.content:
The school uniform for{girls}is a navy-blue skirt and cardigan or jumper, a pale-blue blouse, white or navy socks or natural coloured tights or stockings. Also black, brown or dark blue shoes.
The{boy's}school uniform is charcoal trousers, a white or blue shirt, dark socks, a navy-blue jumper and black or brown shoes.
In our school we have over fifty BBC computers.
For P.E. we have a gym, a sports hall and swimming pool, as well as a a hall with markings for badminton. Outside is a big playing field. We have equipment for rugby, soccer, hockey, athletics, basketball, volleyball, badminton, table-tennis and lots more.
